CustomField.description: Option 1 - I will provide a copy of our current capacity chart which Amadeus will use to create maximum capacities within +/- a 10% tolerance of the number listed. This option is best suited for properties who do have existing capacity charts.Option 2 - Amadeus to generate maximum capacities using room diagram dimensions, and the Inventory Worksheet for Inventory Sizes, Seating Style measurements that you have provided. Please note these maximum capacities are generated automatically based on the above. This option is best suited for pre-opening/newly renovated properties who do not have existing capacity charts.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Option 1 - I will provide a copy of our current capacity chart which Amadeus will use to create maximum capacities within +/- a 10% tolerance of the number listed. This option is best suited for properties who do have existing capacity charts.Option 2 - A
CustomField.label: Maximum Capacity Option
